userStories.title: Refine Markitecture Diagram to Stakeholder Consensus
userStories.description: As a founder preparing for investor/customer conversations, I need a polished executive markitecture diagram that achieves approval from all four stakeholder personas (C-Suite, Tech Leadership, Customer, Sales/BD).
acceptanceCriteria: Source file: docs/diagrams/src/newcastle-markitecture-v8.d2 (or new version)
Render diagram using: d2 --theme 0 <source> <output>.png
View rendered PNG using Read tool to visually evaluate
Simulate C-Suite Executive feedback: Can understand value in 5 seconds, board-ready appearance
Simulate Tech Leadership feedback: System boundary clear, data flows accurate
Simulate Customer (RCM Director) feedback: Recognizes their problem, appropriate jargon
Simulate Sales/BD Leader feedback: Can open conversation, creates curiosity
All personas provide verdict: Approved or Approved with minor notes
No persona has Blocking concern
If any persona says Needs revision, edit source and re-iterate
Diagram is: Intuitive, Sharp, Slide-ready (16:9), Professional, Modern, Clean
Uses Clay Street Group palette: Cyan #00AEEF (hero), Green #6CC24A (value), Grays #4D4D4D/#999999
Final output: docs/diagrams/output/newcastle-markitecture-final.png and .svg
userStories.notes: Iteration loop: Render → View with Read tool → Simulate 4 personas → Edit if needed → Repeat until consensus. Current known issues: Data Sources container positioned right instead of above, layout may be too spread out, 'personalizes' label may be too subtle.

userStories.title: Refine C4 Context Diagram to Stakeholder Consensus
userStories.description: As a founder preparing for technical discussions, I need a polished C4 System Context diagram that achieves approval from all four stakeholder personas (C-Suite, Tech Leadership, Customer, Sales/BD).
acceptanceCriteria: Source file: docs/diagrams/src/newcastle-c4-context-v3.puml (or new version)
Render diagram using: plantuml -tpng <source>
View rendered PNG using Read tool to visually evaluate
Simulate C-Suite Executive feedback: Clear system purpose, professional appearance
Simulate Tech Leadership feedback: Correct abstraction level, accurate integrations
Simulate Customer (RCM Director) feedback: Understands how it fits their workflow
Simulate Sales/BD Leader feedback: Good conversation starter for technical buyers
All personas provide verdict: Approved or Approved with minor notes
No persona has Blocking concern
If any persona says Needs revision, edit source and re-iterate
Diagram is: Intuitive, Sharp, Slide-ready (16:9), Professional, Modern, Clean
Uses Clay Street Group palette: Cyan #00AEEF (hero), Grays #4D4D4D/#999999
Final output: docs/diagrams/output/newcastle-context-final.png and .svg
userStories.notes: Iteration loop: Render → View with Read tool → Simulate 4 personas → Edit if needed → Repeat until consensus. Current known issues: May need better visual hierarchy, relationship labels could be clearer.
